description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Main Purpose of the Job:
              
              3 Quantity Surveyor mainly in overall project, 2 Quantity Surveyor in MEP
              

              + Job Description (Key Responsibilities):
              
              - To demonstrate a best understanding of Standard Method of Measurement daily works.
              
              - To reach a professional standard in description / measuring / bulk check quantities of structural trades and finishes trades accurately.
              
              - To highly understand the level of rate, be able to do built up unit rate of architect and structural trades accurately.
              
              - To review professionally designs in order to determine whether design is sufficient for BQ measurement.
              
              - To search material sources / adequate design for potential project.
              
              - To follow up and update material prices trend on market.
              
              - To do cost analysis record of project/ summary of project quantities.
              
              - To be able to do Value Engineering (VE).
              
              - To improve and manage the cost database and other operation databases.
              
              - To monitor, manage and check Bill of quantity (BQ), Pre-Tender Estimation (PTE), Tender Documentation, Cost Estimation, Cost Plan, Contract package.
              
              - To prepare Payment Certificates to contractors.
              
              - To prepare Final account, Variation others to consultants.
              
              - To prepare Financial reports, Statements…
              
              - To complete Tender Document, Contract Documentation and other reports to high standard
              
              - To attend project meetings and discuss with clients / contractor / consultants.
              
              - To be able to propose finishing schedule for project.
              
              - To be able to construct and write reports.
              
              - To be able to advise and present matters to clients / contractor / consultants.
              
              - To attend Tender interviews/Tender assessment report of Tenderer submission.
              
              - To demonstrate and understanding of contractual issues and to show an ability to prepare contractual letters.
              
              - To be able to prepare outgoing docs to QA/QC standard.
              
              - To show ability for training Quantity Surveyors.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University graduate in Construction, Economic construction, Architect, Mechanic
              
              - Well understanding about building material.
              
              - Fluent in written and spoken English.
              
              - Knowledge and experience of construction market is essential.
              
              - At least 5-8 years Quantity Surveying experience. Preferred - work experience in hotel, resort and high- rise building.
              
              - Experience with Infrastructure is essential.
              
              - Experience with FIDIC Conditions of Contract is essential.
              
              - Experience with cost management and reporting of trade packages essential.
              
              - Claims management experience is essential.
              
              - To be able to manage deadlines, work independently to carry out the task and meet deliverable expectation.
              
              - Willing to work overtime / at weekend to fulfill the pending tasks or urgent requirement.
              
              - Willing to support / help colleague in the company.
              
              - To well understand about relevant projects / filing / recording.
              
              - To show ability for dealing with both international and local clients directly and at meetings without supervision.
              
              - To be well presented, professional and present a good image for the firm.
              
              - To be carefully, hardworking, straightforward.
              
              - CV must be in English
              

              * Salary: 10,000,000 - 25,000,000 VND
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
